channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Skype for Business
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Skype for Business

item.title: CVE-2017-11786|2024-09-16T18:03:43.734Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- skype%20for%20business
item.description: Skype for Business in Microsoft Lync 2013 SP1 and Skype for Business 2016 allows an attacker to steal an authentication hash that can be reused elsewhere, due to how Skype for Business handles authentication requests, aka "Skype for Business Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."
